chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: Good day, I ordered the device and provided a wrong delivery address, the post couldn't change the address and the order is already on its way to the sender. What should I do? How can I replace or cancel an order? Thank you for your help,

Hello,  

The customer's package is being sent back to you.  

Can you please resend the package to the customer after you receive it?  

Daniil Kozulia
Mùhlgastraße 67
41199 Mönchengladbach
Deutschland
098 303 7108
daniilkozulia@gmail.com

Thank you, 
Aysah, from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have informed our logistics partner. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Regards,
AS

Hello,

Did you receive it?

https://www.ups.com/track?loc=de_DE&tracknum=1ZBF15606888748043&requester=ST/trackdetails

Regards,
Aysah, Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We confirm reception of the device, we are currently arranging a reshipment of the device to the customer. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

OK, I'm waiting for the TN.

Regards,
Aysah, Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Here is the TN: 1ZBF1560D901096427

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

Apologies, I sent the wrong TN. Here is the TN 1ZBF1560D901187927 

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

The parcel with tracking number 1ZBF1560D901187927-91940888 could not be delivered due to an incorrect or incomplete address.

Please provide us with the correct address, the recipient's name, and phone number. Alternatively, you may ask the carrier to reschedule the delivery. Please ask the customer to check the provided details as the address does not exist:

Daniil Kozulia
Mùhlgastraße 67
41199 Mönchengladbach
Deutschland
098 303 7108
daniilkozulia@gmail.com

Thank you.

Regards
Mandi Xhaferaj

Dear ecomobile

the costumer changed his mind ando would like to be refunded.

Since the parcel has been returned to you we give you a deadline of 24 hours to refund the costumer.

If not we will do it for you.

Please take this into consideration.

Regards,
Marco from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request and have updated our logistics partner. We will keep you updated. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Regards,
AS

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded 441,36 € to the customer for not refunding the costumer in the mentioned deadline.

Please consult your SSC for further questions.

Thank you.

Kind regards, 
Marco from Back Market
